title: Educational Design Research (EDR) Workshop for Improving Problem-Based Learning (PBL) Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic problem-solving and team collaboration skills, foundational understanding of social sector roles
context.additional_context: PBL methodology training for learners over 40 in managerial/leadership roles to strengthen social sector job competencies. While personal devices allow free access to materials, technical limitations may arise during collaborative activities.

learning_goals: Learners can acquire the ability to systematically design problem analysis and exploration procedures.
Learners can develop PBL activity sequences for each phase using design thinking techniques.
Learners can improve PBL implementation methodologies through the iterative learning design (EDR) process.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
